calendar.description: House Economic Development and Workforce Services Hearing
Senate Health and Human Services Hearing

general_provisions: This bill addresses the use of genetic sequencing tools and the storage of genetic sequencing data.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>prohibits the use of certain genetic sequencers and genetic sequencing software;<hr><ltbullet>prescribes requirements and restrictions related to the storage of genetic sequencing data;<hr><ltbullet>requires relevant entities to certify compliance with genetic sequencing requirements;<hr><ltbullet>authorizes the attorney general to investigate alleged violations of genetic sequencing requirements, and initiate civil actions for those violations; and<hr><ltbullet>provides protections for an employee who reports a suspected violation of genetic sequencing requirements to the attorney general.
